name: Way to go
description:
Game presented to the King [NotOnlyGames] Jam 2019 by Seleden Gamers.
Winner of the "Most creative game" award.

https://www.instagram.com/p/B4-ftwqjCp8/?utm_source=ig_web_copy_link

The game consists of a local multiplayer game where there can be as much players as letters has the keyboard of your computer. One key, one player.

Every player has to press their key at the right time to make their character advance and push the walls to destroy them. Together, any wall can be overcomed.

If all the players press their key at the right rythm, a combo would be completed and minions would add to the players task of demolishing the walls that stand in the way.

Seleden Gamers is a team formed by La Salle URL engneering students:

  • Adrià Franquesa Balcells
  • Ricard Juan Pujol 
  • Alex Valle Tavira
  • Joel López Romero
